author: dr:ez.no
msg: - Added the getRelatedPartByID() method to ezcMailMultipartRelated that
returns a mail part by looking for it's Content-ID.

author: rb:ez.no
msg: - Fixed problems with the escape(s), and add test cases for it.

author: sa:ez.no
msg: - Added support for looking autoload definition files
and loading related class definition files from
other directories besides the eZ components ones.
